Miscellaneous Highlights: The India vs South Africa T20 World Cup final will be held at the Kensington Oval in Barbados on June 29, 2024.
The match will be live screened at 8 pm IST.
The live screening in Delhi will be available on Star Sports Network and the Disney+ Hotstar app and website.
Others: The T20 World Cup final will be held on June 29, 2024.
